channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Footpath Safety Concern – Leaf Build-Up, 26th December
item.description:
Dear Sir or Madam, I would like to report a build-up of leaves on the footpath at woodcroft n21. The accumulation is creating a slip hazard and poses a risk to pedestrians using the path. I would be grateful if this could be addressed as soon as possible to reduce the risk of accidents.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Woodcroft, Palmers Green, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping, 26th December
item.description:
Pile of trash on woodland trail. Note, location is in the wood adjacent to footpath, this specific location: Https://maps.app.goo.gl/HZtd53eATqwdJ7887

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Carnet Close, Crayford, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road leaking by pedestrian crossing, 26th December
item.description:
There is water gushing from the pavement down Brampton road, at the pedestrian crossing by the gym / college. It is causing a massive puddle by the crossing so you’re unable to avoid getting your feet wet / wet by a car! This happened previously and it’s still not sorted. It is getting worse and worse
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 5, Brampton Road, Blendon, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Multiple deep potholes on boilerhouse roundabout, 26th December
item.description:
Multiple deep potholes on boilerhouse roundaboutand ramps. Have been there for months. Almost caused me to drop off my motorcycle as one of potholes is a massive groove that 'grabbed' my front wheel.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Byron Close, Thamesmead
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bed parts dumped, 26th December
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 26, Rockbourne Road, Forest Hill, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street tree in need of pruning, 26th December
item.description:
Large branches have broken off several trees in Kent House Road during the recent windy weather. There is a pile of them outside 116. All the mature trees in this road are in desperate need of pruning. Trees in Lennard Road are pruned every year but having lived here for 45 years I have yet to see any management of the trees except when they are so dangerous they need removal!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kent House Road, New Beckenham, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dead animal or similar in overfilled bin causing fly infestation in private property, 26th December
item.description:
There is a dead animal or animal foul which has been put into a public litter bin which is full and overflowing onto the street. There are large flies entering our home from this bin and we have made several complaints with no response. Clean this up and empty immediately

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Roper Street, Eltham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

item.title: Blocked gully great, 26th December
item.description:
Gully grate opposite no 43 , grate is blocked causing water drainage to by pass drain and pond in the road on junction which will cause large area to freeze in cold weather and cause a dangerous hazard on road, needs unblocking.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Hill Close, Elmstead, Greater London
